forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 66F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 66F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 19C. NE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 67F. NE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers tapering off in the evening with foggy conditions overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 63F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
